testimoni.name: Abdillah Izraqi Zihni
testimoni.content: I want to transform how people experience 'Halo' in their living rooms and on their PCs. We will neve do anything that doesn't move the universe forward.

testimoni.name: Monkey D Garp
testimoni.content: What a great area. Maybe we should put it under the direct control of Marine Headquarters.

testimoni.name: Monkey D Luffy
testimoni.content: Dying is not repaying a debt! That is not what he saved you for! Only weak men would die after someone spared their lives!
